Uses of Class
br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.cards.Card

  • Packages that use Card 
    Package Description
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles
    The core classes of the application, such as the desktop starter, the controller and the player profile.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model
    The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.cards  
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.enemies
    Classes for building the Enemy AI.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.enemies.conditions
    Decision-making auxiliary classes for the Enemy AI.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.items  
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d
    This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens
    The visual layer (interfaces).
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.scripts
    The scripts are classes which specify the behavior of cards in battles.
